business_info.name: TechGadgets Store
business_info.tagline: Your One-Stop Shop for Tech Accessories

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 days) is available for an additional $9.99. Free shipping on orders over $50!

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes! We ship to over 50 countries. International shipping typically takes 10-15 business days. Shipping costs vary by location and are calculated at checkout.

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with your tracking number. You can also give me your order ID and I'll look up the tracking info for you!

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in original packaging. Simply initiate a return through your account or contact us. Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the item.

faqs.question: How do I return an item?
faqs.answer: To return an item: 1) Contact us with your order ID, 2) We'll email you a prepaid return label, 3) Pack the item securely and drop it off at any carrier location. Your refund will be processed once we receive it.

faqs.question: Can I exchange an item?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! For exchanges, please return the original item and place a new order for the replacement. This ensures you get your new item as quickly as possible. We'll refund the original once received.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, Amex, Discover), PayPal, Apple Pay, Google Pay, and Shop Pay. All transactions are securely encrypted.

faqs.question: Is my payment information secure?
faqs.answer: Yes! We use industry-standard SSL encryption and are PCI-DSS compliant. We never store your full credit card details on our servers. Your security is our top priority.

faqs.question: Do you offer payment plans?
faqs.answer: Yes! For orders over $100, you can use Shop Pay Installments or Klarna to split your purchase into 4 interest-free payments. Select your preferred option at checkout.

faqs.question: Are your products covered by warranty?
faqs.answer: Yes! All our products come with a minimum 1-year manufacturer warranty. Some items have extended warranties. If you experience any defects, contact us and we'll help you get a replacement.

faqs.question: How do I know if a product is compatible with my device?
faqs.answer: Each product page lists compatible devices. If you're unsure, send me your device model and the product you're interested in, and I'll check compatibility for you!

faqs.question: How do I create an account?
faqs.answer: You can create an account during checkout or visit our website and click 'Sign Up'. Benefits include order tracking, faster checkout, and exclusive member discounts!

faqs.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
faqs.answer: No problem! Visit our website, click 'Login', then 'Forgot Password'. Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link. The link expires in 24 hours for security.

faqs.question: Can I modify my order after placing it?
faqs.answer: We process orders quickly! If your order hasn't shipped yet, contact us ASAP and we'll try to make changes. Once shipped, you'll need to wait for delivery and then request a return/exchange.

faqs.question: My order arrived damaged. What should I do?
faqs.answer: We're so sorry about that! Please take photos of the damage and contact us within 48 hours. We'll send a replacement right away or issue a full refund - your choice!

faqs.question: Do you have any current promotions or discounts?
faqs.answer: We frequently run sales and promotions! Sign up for our newsletter to get 10% off your first order, plus early access to deals. Follow us on social media for flash sales!

faqs.question: How do I apply a coupon code?
faqs.answer: Enter your coupon code in the 'Discount Code' field at checkout, then click 'Apply'. The discount will be reflected in your total. Note: Only one coupon can be used per order.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?

faqs.question: Do you have a physical store?
faqs.answer: We're currently an online-only store, which allows us to offer competitive prices! All orders ship directly from our warehouse to your door.
